characterDescription:
The High Judge of the honorspren in Shadesmar presides over Adolin's trial. He says Adolin isn't a smart one for offering to be tried for the Recreance. He tells Adolin that Tanavast is completely dead and that this world is doomed as it belongs to Odium now.[citation needed]
According to Lusintia, the High Judge is an eternal and immortal spren who blesses them with his presence.
